scripts.report:merge: find cypress/report -name 'mochawesome*.json' -type f | xargs npx mochawesome-merge > cypress/report/report.json || echo 'Nenhum arquivo para merge'
scripts.report:generate: if [ -f cypress/report/report.json ]; then npx marge cypress/report/report.json -f report -o cypress/report --inline; else echo 'Arquivo report.json n√£o encontrado'; fi
